1.content:
Jessie was casually walking the offices in one of the several buildings on campus. He was tired, already wanting go to home despite the shift being just over an hour old. He could only hope that his shift was uneventful.

All day long there was an unshakable feeling in his gut. From the moment he woke up something just felt off. By the second it seemed to get worse and worse. In defiance of the air conditioning Jesse quickly became drenched in sweat.

"I've got to get back to my office." He thought to himself as a wave of lightheadedness swept over him.

With each step his condition worsened and it quickly became difficult to walk. His vision darkened as he dropped to his knees. Falling face first on the floor Jesse blacked out.

Groggily stirring back awake Jesse noticed
a rhythmic thudding reverberated through the ground. As he struggled to push back to his knees the thudding grew stronger. Finally able to sit up and look around Jesse's jaw dropped to the floor.

"No fucking way." He said in complete disbelieving.

Though it seemed impossible Jesse was now only 1 cm tall. That terrifying realization led to another. The rhythmic thuds were actually footsteps, and they were growing louder.

Pushing to his feet quickly Jesse turned around to see an absolutely gigantic person walking towards him. Jesse instantly recognized the giant as....
1.title: Tiny Supervisor

choices: Rosie realizes it's not a bug. (Recognizes Jesse)
Rosie realizes it's not a bug. (Doesn't recognize Jesse)
Rosie thinks the bug looks weird. (Jesse is captured)
13.content:
Towering hundreds of feet tall Rosie padded towards Jesse, her feet clad in silver sandals. Rosie usually wore tennis shoes, but began wearing more sandals lately, especially when she had somewhere to be after work. Jesse and her had a good working relationship, and he knew that she would help him.

"Rosie! Help me!" He called out as he jumped up and down.

She was practically on top of him before she suddenly stopped. Jesse was elated to see that she was looking straight down at him. "Yes! It's me! Help me, I've been shrunk!" He cried out.

He ran towards her jumping up and down excitedly. Rosie brought her right foot into the air above him. "No!" He screamed as it dropped towards him mercilessly.

Diving out of the way Jesse pushed back to his feet. Realizing that she thought he was a bug he decided to run away and fast as he could. He knew he would have to find a better way to be found.

Unfortunately Rosie hadn't given up on squashing what she thought was a bug. Her foot slammed down again just behind Jesse sending him tumbling across the floor. Jesse rolled onto his back in time to see her moving above him.

"Please! Stop! Don't squish me!" He screamed as her foot rose again. Suddenly Rosie....
13.title: His boss Rosie

choices: I'm going to show it to Christine, so she can call the exterminator."
My granddaughter loves to collect bugs. I bet she'll think this one is cool."
I don't know,  just felt like I shouldn't squish it."
134.content:
Jesse clenches his eyes shut as Rosie's foot drops towards him. To his shock the foot slams down just next to his tiny body. Knowing there was no way she would miss Jesse opens his eyes.

Looking up he sees Rosie pulling a napkin from her pocket. She began to kneel down towards him. Still panicked from the attempts to crush him Jesse pushes back to his feet. As fast as he could he ran towards a near by door.

Unfortunately Rosie is able to catch up to him easily. His path is blocked by her foot once again. He falls down, and begins scurrying backwards. Rosie swings her foot over top of the tiny supervisor. "No, please. Stop!" He cries out.

Rosie lowers her foot until the sole of her sandal is pressing into Jesse. Unable to move Jesse is doesn't understand why he is still alive. "What are you doing?" He shouts out in desperation.

As if to answer him Rosie's foot slowly tilts off of him. He sees an opening and begins to crawl out. Just as he exits from under the sandal the napkin falls around him. In one quick motion Rosie closes her hand and snatches Jesse up from the ground.

Held captive in her palm Jesse's heart raced wildly. He didn't understand what was happening, but was thankful not to be crushed. As he was carried, he decided to just relax, and wait to see what happens.

The walk was only a few minutes before Rosie returned to her office. Jesse felt the napkin shifting before he fell out. With a plop he landed in a open plastic container. A life was snapped in just as he looked up.

The smell inside the container was strong. The floor was coated in a thick green liquid. Jesse groaned realizing he was in a left over sauce container from Rosie's lunch.

Jesse toppled over as the container was lifted into the air. Suddenly in front of him was one of Rosie's enormous brown eyes. She was staring right at him, but didn't seem to recognize that he wasn't a bug. "Rosie! It's me! Jesse!" He screamed, pounding on the plastic walls.

Rosie responded by shaking the container around. Jesse was tossed violently inside, becoming coated in the green sauce. "You're one weird ugly bug." Rosie said as she sat in her office chair.

She set the container down, and returned to work. Jesse just sat against wall feeling defeated. He knew he had to find a way to escape, and prove he wasn't a bug.

A few minutes later Jesse heard someone else come into the office. He recognized the person as Gladys, an older Hispanic woman, and friend of Rosie's. She was also one of the janitorial staff.

They spoke for several minutes before Rosie pointed to the container Jesse was in. "It's a strange bug, I found in building 3." She said.

Gladys leaned in looking closely at Jesse before carelessly tapping the top of the container. Each tap might as well have been a gunshot. Grimacing, Jesse covered his ears tightly.

"Disgusting. Why on earth did you catch it ?" She asked.

Rosie shrugged. "Well.....
134.title: Rosie thinks the bug looks weird. (Jesse is cap...

choices: Tells Rosie to take it with her.
Tosses the container in the trash.
Drops it to the ground to stomp.
1341.content:
Jesse heard Rosie's plan, bit couldn't do anything about it. At his tiny size he couldn't even reach the top of the small container. He knew that until someone let him out, he was trapped.

He watched from his plastic prison as Rosie got caught up in work as usual. She hadn't so much as glanced his way in over an hour. She finally looked up at the clock and realized it was getting late. "Shit!" She said, in frustration.

Pushing to her feet quickly she began to gather her things. She was nearly to the door before she turned back. Marching back to her desk she snatched the container up, sending Jesse slamming into the side.

Her enormous hand wrapped completely around the container as she made her way to Christine's office. Jesse was sloshed back and forth with every exaggerated sway of her arm. Unable to grasp hold of anything in the smooth container he was completely at her mercy.

Finally she stopped in front of Christine's work area. She set the container down on her desk with a heavy thump. "I found this is building 3." She said, and Jesse struggled to pick himself up.

Christine looked at her with confusion as she plucked the container into the air. "A sauce cup ?" She asked tilting the container back and forth.

"No, it's a big bug." Rosie said.

Christine peered inside spotting the sauce coated Jesse. "Okay, so why are you bringing it to me ?" She asked, still confused.

"I hadn't seen one like it before. It's weird looking." Rosie explained. "I was hoping you could schedule the exterminator this weekend ?"

A curious Christine slowly popped the top off of the container. "Careful." Rosie warned.

Jesse's heart raced as fresh air, and light poured in. "Christine! Help me! It's Jesse!" He screamed, and he waves his arms.

Christine stared down studying his tiny form. "It looks aggressive. Like it's challenging me, or something." She said, misreading Jesse's body language.

"Yeah. It ran right at me!" Rosie said, agreeing with Christine.

"No, no!" Jesse screamed. "It's me Jesse! I need your help!"

Christine brought her phone up and snapped a picture of Jesse. The flash nearly blinded him, forcing him to cower away. "Fuck!" He yelled in frustration.

When he looked back he saw the tip of a ballpoint pen hovering above him. Christine poked at him roughly. Slamming him against the side of the container. She used the pen to turn him every which way.

"Okay, so I'll send the picture to the exterminator, and see what hey say." Christine said, pulling the pen away, and popping the lid back on.

"Sounds good. Let me know what he says." Rosie said, turning to leave. "I've got to go I'm already running late. Do you mind taking care of that? "

Christine grabs the container from her table and......
1341.title: I'm going to show it to Christine, so she c...

13411.content:
Rosie looked at the time on her phone and groaned. "Fine, I'll have to deal with it later though." She said roughly grabbing the container from Christine.

A moment later Jesse felt himself free falling. with a thud the container landed inside Rosie's purse before she closed the opening sealing away the light. Instantly she began to walk again, her purse held tightly under her arm.

Jesse realized the container was on its side, and quickly began to push against the lid. At his tiny size he might well have tried pushed over a brick wall. "Damn it!" He growled kicking the container repeatedly.

During his tantrum Rosie tossed her purse haphazardly into the passenger seat. Jesse slammed violent against the lid of the container. He slumped down in the green sauce and didn't bother to stand back up.

Hours past by as Rosie went about the rest of her day. Jesse was tossed around by her every careless movement. He was always thankful whenever she dropped her purse for extended periods of time.

Finally Jesse heard Rosie enter her home. He could tell by the sounds of her daughter, and granddaughter welcoming her. He heard the front door close before the purse swung through the air. It hit the wall before being hung on a hook.

Hearing the giantesses walking away Jesse felt a lump forming in his throat. He realized that Rosie may have forgot about her tiny captive. A fact proven as the hours ticked by, and the house grew silent.

Exhausted Jesse decided to eat some of the green sauce, and try to sleep. He knew there was way he would survive this starving and sleep deprived. Leaning back against the curved wall of the container Jesse fell asleep surprisingly fast.

Jesse was startled awake as the container began to move. Looking around he saw that he was.....
13411.title: Tells Rosie to take it with her.

134113.content:
The container rolled across the ground like a wheel until smashing into something hard. Shaking the dizziness Jesse pushed back to his feet. Peering out the side of the container Jesse saw Rosie's chubby barefeet.

Jesse realized that he was still in Rosie's house. With everything going on he forgot that yesterday was Friday. Now on a Saturday morning Rosie sat in her living room on her laptop, while watching the morning news.

She had set her purse in front of the couch, when it tipped over the container rolled under the edge of her coffee table. As She reached down to sit the purse back upright it was obvious she hadn't noticed the container. Jesse watched as she returned to work on her laptop without a second glance downward.

Looked around the container, that was balanced on its side. To his shock he saw that in all the commotion the lid had popped off slightly. There was a small gap along one edge that he could fit his arm through.

Ignoring the giantess above Jesse quickly got to work on the lid. Through repeating prying, and pushing the gap grew larger. Eventually it looked large enough for Jesse to squirm through.

Without hesitation Jesse began to push through the opening. It was tight, but he was quickly halfway through. Sudden movement drew his attention back towards Rosie. His eyes went wide as her foot slid forward. "Shit!" He cursed loudly.

Just as he fell from the container Rosie's toes dropped onto it. He watched as the plastic buckled under the weight. The lid he worked so hard to barely budge, popped off effortlessly.


Rosie's foot quickly pulled back as she looked down to see what she hit. Jesse's eyes went wide as she saw him. "Crap!" She said remembering the insect she caught she day before.

Jesse turned to run away as fast as he could. Without looking back he heard the couch creak as Rosie pushed to her feet. Breathing heavily he hid behind the leg of the coffee table. Peeking around the corner he watched Rosie's bare feet as she moved around to see where he had went.

Rosie knelt down, looking under the coffee table. Jesse cowered in the corner hoping to remain out of sight. He yelped as her hand shot under the table, sweeping the floor to find him. "Fuck!" He whispered under his breath.

Too fast for him to react Rosie's fingers knock him into the table leg. While he's disoriented her fingers easily pluck him into the air. Held in her unbreakable grip Jesse looks up at an extremely annoyed Rosie. "Rosie! Stop! It's Jesse!" He screams.

As her grip tightened intending to crush him Jesse acts out of desperation. With all of his might he chomps down on Rosie's finger. The giantess winces and releases Jesse. The tiny supervisor finds himself falling quickly through the air.

He lands with a cushioned plop on the couch below. Rosie quickly spots him and resumes her attack. Jesse barely had time to react as her hand comes down.

Jesse feels extreme pressure on his entire body. Fortunately his tiny form, and the plush couch keep him from being obliterated. Though alive Jesse is barely conscious, and unable to move.

To Rosie, Jesse looks dead, she lifts his limp body roughly between her thumb and forefinger. The giantess leaves the living room to toss the tiny supervisor into....
134113.title: Tumbling out of Rosie's purse.

choices: Try to get Rosie's attention again.
1341132.content:
Jesse opened his eyes just before splashing down into cold water. Surfacing quickly he looked around in a panic. He realized instantly that Rosie had tossed him into the toilet bowl. "Oh fuck!" He screamed.

"Disgusting bug." Rosie groaned as she looked down at him.

He saw her reaching for the flush lever before suddenly stopping. To his horror she lowers her shorts as she turns around. He watches as her bare ass falls onto the toilet seat above. "Rosie! Stop! Please, don't do this!" He cries out.

A heavy water fall of dark urine flows from Rosie. Despite his attempts to avoid it Jesse it hit squarely. The impact of the urine pushes him violently under the water. The continued flow from Rosie causes the water to spin and churn.

As she finally finishes Jesse swims to the surface. The putrid scent fills the air, burning his eyes and nose. He sees Rosie reach between her legs to gently pat herself dry with a small bundle of toilet paper.

A moment after the toilet paper falls Rosie stands up. She pulls up her shorts before reaching for the flush lever. Jesse screams out as she pushes it down, sending the water falling quickly out of the bowl.

Jesse swirls roughly through the long dark pipes. The current gradually begins to slow as the water takes a sudden turn. Rising to the top of the water Jesse takes a breath of the horrid air. To his surprise he can see light above.

As the water slowly rises Jesse realizes that there must be a clog in the pipe. Instead of being flushed into the sewers, he's rising towards another drain in the house. As he passes by giant clumps of wet hair he knows this must be a shower drain.

Unfortunately the water didn't rise all the way to the top. Jesse was forced to use the clumps of hair to climb the rest of the way. His tiny size allowed him to easily slip through the drain guard and on to the shower floor.

Jesse decided to strip off his filthy clothes. He didn't want to be naked when he was finally able to get help, but the smell was too horrible to take. He dropped his soiled clothes back down the drain before leaving the shower.

As he stepped out onto the plush bath mat Jesse knew he had to figure out what to do next. Staying this tiny just wasn't an option for him. With the desire to return to full size in mind Jesse decided to...
1341132.title: The toilet.

13411321.content:
Despite every humiliating event up to this point Jesse knew he had to get help. As of right now his only hope was Rosie. So with that in mind he slid under the bathroom door to search for his giantess boss.

At his tiny size searching an enormous home seemed impossible. He continued on, trudging through carpet as tall as he was. As he came towards the kitchen he heard movement inside.

He quickened his pace and moved through the door. Rosie was standing by the refrigerator while talking on the phone. Jesse began trekking across the hardwood floor. "Rosie!" He called up to her as loudly as possible.

Occupied both by a casual snack, and her phone conversation Rosie didn't so much as glance downward. Not willing to give up Jesse rushed towards Rosie's still barefeet. Reaching her chubby toes, each taller than him Jesse began to climb onto Rosie's left foot.

From atop her enormous big toe Jesse began to tap her skin repeatedly. A slight twitch filled Jesse with hope. "Rosie look down!" He screamed tapping her toe more aggressively.

Jesse was unprepared as Rosie's right foot rose above him. Before he could dive out of the way her meaty toes dropped on to his tiny body. Jesse was mashed, and kneaded as Rosie absentmindedly scratched an itch.

When she had finished Rosie padded out of the kitchen. Jesse had been wedged awkwardly under her chubby toes. Each step mashed him mercilessly.

Unaware of Jesse trapped under her toes Rosie prepares to go grocery shopping, and run errands. Opening her closet she looks at her many shoes. Reaching down she grabs.....
13411321.title: Try to get Rosie's attention again.

13413.content:
Jesse felt weightlessness as Christine callously releases the container. The impact from the ground sent Jesse, and the container rolling. When the container stopped it was sitting upright in front of Christine's sandal clad feet.

Before Jesse could even react the giantess brought her foot down on the container. The plastic walls buckled under the pressure. Jesse cowered in the center of the cup, his tiny form saving his life. Even as Christine added pressure and twisted her foot she couldn't fully collapse the container.

Christine's foot lifted off of the container setting back down beside it. With the pressure removed the plastic partially popped back in place. Jesse noticed the cup of the container was separated from the lid. Without hesitation he crawled through as the giantess knelt down to retrieve the crushed container.

"Shit!" Christine growled spotting the escaping Jesse.

Jesse narrowly avoids the first swipe of a giant hand. Then somehow even the second, but the third sends him to the ground. Christine's fingers slam down on top of him with force. Jesse tries to push them away, but he's no match for even her index finger.

He struggles desperately as Christine pulls him back into the open. Jesse frantically chomps down on her finger causing her to yelp. Absentmindedly Christine flicks her wrist sending the tiny supervisor flying through the air.

The annoyed giantess scans the floor, and her desk for Jesse, but doesn't see him. With a groan Christine pulls her chair back under her unaware that Jesse landed.....
13413.title: Drops it to the ground to stomp.

134132.content:
With a heavy plop Christine sat down in her chair, unknowingly pressing Jesse under her jeans clad ass. Continuing with her work the giantess trapped Jesse entirely. The tiny supervisor was unable to move a muscle under her intense weight.

Time seemed to virtually stand still under Christine's monstrous ass. Her every movement ground him mercilessly into the chair. When the giantess finally stood Jesse was horrified to realize he was stuck to her butt.

Christine walked through the office, her jeans shifting against her body with every step. It wasn't long before Jesse fell back to the floor below. Landing unharmed he watched as Christine thankfully moved further away.

Pushing back to his feet Jesse ran towards the door. He had no intention of staying in an office where someone wanted to crush him. He was nearly there when he heard footfalls behind him.

Turning he saw the returning Christine. Unfortunately she also noticed the scurrying supervisor. He attempted to escape as the giantess rushed forward with murderous intent.

Barely avoiding Christine's stomp Jesse was launched forward as her foot slammed down. Crawling quickly towards a low cabinet Jesse is unable to move out of the way as her sandal clad foot drops on top of him. The pressure increases as she leans her weight in.

Too much to handle Jesse's body begins to crumble under the pressure. As Christine callously twists her foot back and forth the tiny supervisor is turned to pasted. Satisfied the giantess drags her foot backward, smearing Jesse into the carpet. .
134132.title: On her chair.

choices: The girl had taken him to school
The girl was coming home from school
The girl's older sister had come to grab laundry
1342.content:
Soon after Gladys left, the container with Jesse was shoved haphazardly into Rosie's purse. He remained there for hours as the workday went by. Eventually Rosie went home, taking her purse and Jesse with her.

Roughly an hour after Rosie got home she retrieved the container from her purse. Jesse watched in disbelief as she handed it over to a 9 year old girl. The girl excitedly raised the container to her eye, staring in at Jesse. "What kind of bug is it?" She asked.

"I don't know baby, I've never seen one like it." Rosie said. "That's why I brought it to you."

The girl jostled the container lightly to get a better view of Jesse. Still not being recognized as human Jesse pounded on the side of the plastic. "Hey! I'm not a bug!" He screamed.

"It's awesome! I'm going to check it out right now!" The girl said turning to leave.

"Just be careful sweety, if it gets out in my house I'm squishing it." Rosie warned ominously.


Once inside the girl's bedroom Jesse was unceremoniously dumped from the container. He pushed to his feet on a piece of white paper under a bright lamp. The girl stared down at him with a look of curiosity.

"Hey! Little girl! I'm not a bug!" He protested as loudly as he could.

Not hearing his cries the girl produced a q-tip and began cleaning the green sauce from Jesse. He tried to push the cotton swabs away, but he was powerless against her. "Granny got you kinda dirty huh little guy." She said in a gentle voice.

After cleaning Jesse up the girl grabbed her phone and began taking numerous pictures of him. The flash was blinding leaving him unable to see. A moment after the last flash Jesse felt tweezers pinch his body.

As his vision returned he saw the girl examining him through a magnifying glass. "You're a really weird bug." She said perplexed.

"I'm not a bug!" Jesse groaned as he waved his arms back and forth.

The girl dropped Jesse back to the paper below while still holding the magnifying glass. "Only four legs, but stands on the back two." She observed under her breath.

Jesse wanted to run, but he knew she would catch him. And even if he did escape Rosie would crush him on sight. His only hope was this little girl realizing he wasn't a bug.

Suddenly the girl yawned deeply. She set the magnifying glass down and stretched in her chair. "Wait! Look closer! I'm human!" Jesse said absentmindedly rushing towards the giantess girl.

In the blink of an eye the girl's enormous hand dropped down on Jesse. He was slammed hard against the desk nearly knocking the wind out of him. "Hey, that's not nice, trying to run away." The girl said frustrated. "If you get out Granny will step on you dummy." She said picking Jesse up between her thumb and forefinger.

She dumped Jesse on the ground much to his confusion. Jesse didn't try to run, or even stand. He didn't want to upset his young captor.

The girl pushed to her feet, towering high above Jesse. "You're a really weird bug, but if you're too much trouble I'll just squish you." She said bringing her slightly dirty barefoot over Jesse.

Fighting his instinct to run away Jesse remained still until the girl lowered her foot. After her foot set down she picked Jesse up from the floor. "Good bug. I don't want to squish you." She said dropping Jesse into a small plastic box.

"I'll play with you more tomorrow." She said as she turned off her desk lamp. "I've got to go to bed."

Jesse watched as the little girl climbed in bed and quickly fell asleep. Knowing he couldn't escape he decided to sleep as well. He fell asleep quickly after such a long traumatic day.

When Jesse began to awaken he saw.....
1342.title: My granddaughter loves to collect bugs. I bet s...

choices: Abby was late, he was to be crushed
Abby was late, he was be released outside
13421.content:
Jesse was startled awake as his plastic prison began to jostle. Looking around he saw he was in complete darkness. He could hear several muffled voices around him.

"C'mon let me see." One said, sounding youthful.

"Yeah! C'mon Abby! Show us." Another young voice said.

Several more chimed in with similar demands. Light shone through an opening as a giant hand shot down towards him. The massive hand wrapped around his prison pulling him into the light.

As his visit focused Jesse was terrified as he realized the girl had brought him to school with her. Children all roughly the girls age surrounded, and stared down at him. A new hand grasped the plastic box before bringing it to their eye. "It's so ugly." The giant boy said before passing the box to another kid.

Jesse's heart pounded loudly in his chest as he was passed around between a seemingly endless chain of 9 year olds. He was tossed and slung around by reckless movements, and playful shaking. Fingers constantly tapped the box causing thunderous booms to echo through his ears.

Suddenly back in the girl's hands he felt an unexpected wave of relief. Unfortunately that past as the box was suddenly snatched from her hands. In the blink of an eye an older girl had Jesse in hand.

"Hey! Give that back!" The girl demanded.

The bully violently shook the box, slamming Jesse hard against the walls. "Eww! Gross! Bug girl has another pet." She mocked.

As the girl desperately reached out to grab the box the bully jumped back. Jesse was powerless to do anything as she began to run away. Looking up her saw the girl smiling deviously before intentionally dropping the box.

As it slammed into the ground he saw the girl running to grab him. Before she could the bully dropped her converse clad foot on top of the box. The plastic creaked as she added more and more pressure.

"Stop it! You'll squish him!" The girl pleaded.

"Uhm, yeah, that's what you're suppose to do to bugs dummy." The bully mocked as she twisted her foot back and forth on the box.

"What's going on here!?" An adult female voice called out.

Almost instantly the chaos around Jesse ended. The bully stepped off of the box and moved away as if to distance herself from blame. "Janie took my pet bug, and was going to stomp on it." The girl said pointing to Jesse on the ground.

The teacher saw the box and sighed. "Abby, you know I told you to stop being bugs to school." She groaned.

Jesse watched as the teacher walked towards him. Her leather Birkenstocks causing heavy tremors to run through the floor. Her massive well manicured hand wrapped around the box and lifted it into the air.

"Janie. Go to the principal's office." The teacher ordered sternly.

"Yes, Ms. Blake." Janie said softly before leaving.

Ms. Blake walked towards Abby with Jesse in hand. She reached out for the box but Ms. Blake didn't release it. "Abby, you can't keep bringing bugs to school we've talked about this. Repeatedly." She said. "I'm going to hold to this for now. Go back to class."

"Can I get him after school?" Abby asked.

"If you're even one second late, I'm either going to toss this thing outside, or squish it myself." She said firmly. "Do I make myself clear ?"

Abby's head hung down. "Yes ma'am." She said before turning to leave.

Ms. Blake carried the box with Jesse back to her classroom. Without even looking at him closely she dropped the box in her desk draw and slammed it closed. Once again in darkness Jesse waited nervously, hoping that Abby wasn't late.

After the last bell had rung Jesse stood in anticipation. It seemed to take forever for the drawer to open again. As Ms. Blake brought him into the light he saw....
13421.title: The girl had taken him to school

134212.content:
As he was raised into the air Jesse frantically looked around for Abby. With the girl no where in sight he began to panic. His plastic container was set down on Ms. Blake's desk. The giantess looked down on him in disgust.

Ms. Blake glanced at her clock, and looked back at Jesse. She sat there ominously for another five minutes before looking at the clock again. She reached back towards Jesse popping the top off of the plastic box.

Too small to climb, or jump out Jesse was still trapped. He watched as her hand lowered out of sight before reappearing with one of her Birkenstocks. "Hey! Wait! Lady, I am not a bug!" He screamed as he pounded on the plastic wall.

Unaware of his cries Ms. Blake grabbed the plastic box and quickly flipped it upside down. Jesse landed on her desk underneath, and still trapped. She brought the Birkenstock back, prepared to crush him as soon as the box was lifted.

Also prepared Jesse made a mad dash the second the box raised high enough. Ms. Blake brought the Birkenstock down, but off target. Jesse was slung forward by the impact, but he kept on his feet.

He rushed quickly to hide amongst the cups of pens, and various other desktop accessories. Unable to free swing her Birkenstock Ms. Blake began shifting her stuff around looking for Jesse. With few places to hide he was quickly discovered.

In an attempt to sweep him out into the open Ms. Blake unintentionally sent Jesse off the back of her desk. The tiny supervisor landed with a small plop on the floor in front of the giantess's barefoot. Before he could react she unknowingly stepped down on his shrunken body as she moved to look for him.

To Jesse's surprise he wasn't crushed under the soft ball of Ms. Blake's foot. Instead he was stuck to her foot as she scanned the ground for him. Unaware that she had already stepped on him Ms. Blake gives up and slides her Birkenstock back on.

Frustrated that she lost the bug Ms. Blake grabbed her things to leave. With Jesse trapped underfoot she carried him to.....
134212.title: Abby was late, he was to be crushed

1342122.content:
Not usually a fan of choice chapters, but here we are.

As Ms. Blake climbs out of the car at her gym is she there to do hot yoga(barefoot), weight training(high top chucks, no socks), or copious amounts of cardio(socks and sneakers.)
1342122.title: The gym

choices: Ms. Blake was still at the gym.
He was stuck to the sleeping giantess's foot.
He was stuck to the insole of her sweat soaked shoe.
13421222.content:
A few minutes after entering the gym Ms. Blake still stood barefoot after changing into her gym clothes. She dug through her gym back repeatedly becoming more frustrated. "Fucking hell. I forgot my socks!" She groaned as she flopped back onto the bench.

Below her foot, still stuck to her sole, Jesse remained immobilized. He was largely unaware of the situation above him until Ms. Blake began to lower her foot into a very well worn high top converse. The insole had been worn smooth from literal years of wear and tear.

Lacing the shoes up tightly Ms. Blake stood and walked out into the gym. Despite the lack of socks she decided to warm up on the row machine for 10 minutes. Securing gee feet in the straps she pushed hard against them as she pulled the bar back as quickly as she could.

Jesse was mashed mercilessly every time she pushed against the foot rests. By time she finished up sweat had begun to ooze from the soles of her feet. Jesse was relieved when she stood unaware she was walking towards the squat rack.

Under the moist sole of the giantess's foot Jesse was overwhelmed as her weight instantly doubled. For rep after rep, set after set the tiny supervisor was ground under her foot. He wasn't exactly sure when but he eventually blacked out from the extreme pressure.

When he began to groggily stir awake Jesse saw that.....
13421222.title: Weight training/sockless chucks

choices: Set the dustpan against the cart.
141.content:
Walking towards Jesse was the formerly petite Yasmin. Carrying a broom and long handle dust pan she scanned the floor for any debris. Stopping occasionally to sweep up anything she found.

Despite only working for the company for a few days Jesse had seen how thoroughly she cleaned. He knew this was his best bet for being found. Rushing towards the giantess he began waving his arms. "Yasmin! It's me Jesse!" He screamed.

As expected Jesse was quickly spotted. "Yes!" He called out as Yasmin looked down at him.

Yasmin took a couple steps forward, quickly towering directly over Jesse. She leaned in closer only to quickly pull away. Jesse could barely react in time as she jabbed at him with the broom. Dozens of thick bristles knocked him to the ground. With a quick twist she brought the broom up again, before dropping it back down.

Sore, but mostly uninjured Jesse groaned on the floor in pain. The massive opening of the dustpan appeared in front of him an instant before the bristles returned. This time they slung him roughly into the dark cavernous expanse.

As Yasmin lifted the dustpan the head tilted back sending Jesse falling into a pile of dust, hair and other trash. He couldn't believe that she had mistaken him for a bug. It was humiliating, but he was thankful she didn't just step on him.

The giantess carried on with her work, seeking out loose debris to sweep up. The first time she stopped Jesse thought he could escape. Instead he was overtaken by the incoming trash.

Eventually Yasmin returned to her trash cart. Jesse watched through the opening as Yasmin.....
141.title: Yasmin (cleaning staff)

choices: A bug, and tries to squash it.
A bug, and tries to catch it.
A tiny person, doesn't recognize Jesse.
144.content:
As Jesse looked up at the approaching giantess he couldn't have been more relieved. Only a week prior he had given his girlfriend Emma a part time job to earn a little extra cash. Seeing her now, hundreds of feet tall was incredible. "Emma!" He said in amazement.

Emma moved towards Jesse's location quickly. Her size 10 feet clad in white high-top converse sent tremors with each step. Jesse noticed that she had her earbuds in. She wouldn't be able to hear his already tiny voice.

Jesse jumped up and down frantically trying to Emma's attention. Unfortunately he knew she wasn't very thorough, and might not notice him. He craned his head upward as his giantess girlfriend seemed to grow taller as she moved over him.

"Emma! Look down please!" He called out at the top of his lungs.

With a deafening boom Emma's foot fell in front of Jesse. The incredible impact knocked him to the ground. From the flat of his back he watched with held breath as the rubber sole of her converse soared overhead. In a single step the door hundreds of feet away from Jesse's perspective.

"Wait!" He said pushing to his feet. "Don't leave me here!"

As if she heard his pleas Emma stopped and quickly turned around. With another chance to be found Jesse returns to the frantic arm waving. Emma glanced down for a moment, before doing a double take. Her blue eyes fixate on Jesse's tiny form.

"Yes! Yes!" He cried out. "It's me. It's Jesse." His voice cracking from the strain.

Emma moves back over Jesse. Looking down she sees....
144.title: Emma (girlfriend/cleaning staff)

choices: Emily put her feet up on the desk.
153.content:
"Holy shit!" Jesse proclaimed at the sight of the absolutely gigantic Emily.

The security supervisor made her way down the walkway, checking offices as she went. Her heavyset build making her appear all the more enormous. Jesse watched in disbelief as she grew closer, and closer.

Jesse wrestled with indecision, unsure if he should run, or call up to the giantess. Unfortunately Jesse underestimated how quickly the Emily could cover ground. In only a few strides ahead was right on top of him. "Fuck!" He screamed falling backwards as her foot, clad in black sneaker slammed down in front of him.

The tiny supervisor scurried backwards in panic. He craned his head upward, but couldn't see Emily's face past her bulging belly. The reality of being so tiny was setting in.

Taking a deep breath Jesse tried to think rationally. Making a decision quickly Jesse ran back towards the massive shoe. With Emily stopped at an office door he began to climb up her shoe. He just pulled himself up to the laces when Emily began to walk again.

Holding on tightly to the giant laces Jesse felt like he was on a roller coaster. One that was going to cause him to lose all of his lunch. Clenching his eyes closed Jesse focused on his breathing as Emily finished her rounds.

After thirty minutes of the worst carnival ride ever Jesse was elated to see Emily walk into the security office. She mercifully sat back in her chair to watch the monitors. It took another five minutes for Jesse to even think about moving.

Jesse looked up the length of Emily's leg as she sat relaxed in the chair. Taking a deep breath he prepared for the next part of his plan, to climb the giantess. He hoped that if he could get close enough she could hear his cries for help.

Before Jesse could begin his climb......
153.title: Emily (security supervisor)

1531.content:
In the blink of an eye Jesse was forced to hold on tightly to the shoe lace. As Emily's feet lowered towards the desk her legs crossed at the ankles. Jesse was knocked off by the impact as her heels hit the desk. He fell onto the white desktop below with a small plop.

With an annoyed groan he pushed back to his feet. He realized that Emily's stretched out position would make it easier to climb her body. "Well, I guess there's that at least." He sighed.

Focused on his original plan Jesse didn't notice how much he stood out on the on the desk top. Just as he moved back towards Emily's shoe it retreated off of the desk. "What the fuck ?" He asked in shock.

He turned to see Emily staring right at him. "Emily! Help me!" He called out to her as she leaned in closer.

Emily's massive thumb and forefinger reached down, effortlessly picking Jesse up. She opened her hand letting him roll into her palm. "I'm going crazy. There's no way this is a tiny person." She said, her blue eyes laser focused on Jesse.

Jesse pushed back to his feet, feeling uneasy standing on the giant hand. "It's really me! It's Jesse!" He called out hoping she could hear his tiny voice.

Emily exhaled nervously, unintentionally knocking Jesse down with her hot, moist breath. The tiny supervisor was growing frustrated, and desperate. "Emily! It's me damn it." He yells as loudly as he can.

"Okay, okay." Emily began. "You're really...
1531.title: Emily put her feet up on the desk.

choices: Raised her hand to her mouth.
15311.content:
Her words hung in the air for a moment, slowly settling on Jesse. "Yes!" He finally screamed with elation.

Emily leaned back in her chair, clearly shocked at her discovery. She breathed in and out slowly several times. After one last deep breath she sat back up, and looked closer at Jesse.

"So who are you ?" She asked, narrowing her eyes. "And, how the hell did you get so tiny ?"

Jesse nearly fell as she raised her hand to her eyes. The massive blue orbs focusing hard, trying to recognize a person at such a tiny size. "I think I know you!" Emily said, an excited crack in her voice. "You're the housekeeping supervisor! Jesse!"

He'd been found, and recognized. Jesse literally jumped for joy on the giant palm. "Yes! Yes! It's me!" He yelled repeatedly.

"This is so freaky." Emily said. "So how did you shrink ? Did someone shrink you? Maybe a shrink ray ?" She shook her head at her own questions.

"I don't know how, I just shrunk!" Jesse yelled up, but she still couldn't hear him.

Emily continued to look over Jesse with child like curiosity. "Sorry little dude, I just can't hear you." She said apologetically.

Jesse groaned at being called little dude, but ignored it. There really wasn't anything he could do about it. A thought that sent a shiver down his spine.

"People don't just shrink randomly." Emily said perplexed. "There has to be a reason why you're so itty bity."

Sighing Jesse realized he preferred being called little dude. "Just call for help!" He shouted up in frustration.

"Unless of course," Emily continued, unaware of Jesse's frustration. "You shrank yourself. Is that it little dude ? Living out some weird fantasies?" She asked with a slight giggle.

Jesse groaned, suddenly wishing he'd been found by someone more helpful. "No, I did not shrink myself." He said with a annoyed sigh. "Will you please just call someone to help me!" He screamed up at her.

Emily had a look of amusement on her face. "Yeah, that's probably it." She said laughing. "Giant chicks turn you on ?" She asked with a wink.

Jesse's heart sank like a rock. He took a step back without realizing it. "What, that's insane! Please, this isn't a joke!" He yelled, his voice uneasy.

"It's your lucky day little dude," Emily said with a devious grin. "I'm going to make all your dreams come true."

Jesse barely had time to react before Emily....
15311.title: a tiny person."

153113.content:
As Emily's hand rose quickly up Jesse fell backwards on her palm. His heart was beating faster than should be possible. In the blink of an eye he was held under the gaping maw of the security supervisor. "No, no, no, what are you doing?!" He yelled panicked "Stop, this isn't funny!"

Emily's humid breath rolled over him like a thick blanket. Her plump lips pressed against her palm, surrounding Jesse. He saw the flicker of movement before being struck. Without warning Jesse was held firmly in place by Emily's saliva coated tongue.

"Stop!" He gurgled, choking on the giantess's spit.

The massive tongue began to work over Jesse's body with force, and surprising precision. Emily focused on his face, before working her way downward. To his shock, and embarrassment Jesse's body betrayed him to the heat and pressure of the writhing tongue.

Emily pulled away, leaving Jesse panting heavily. "Did you know the tip of the tongue is the most sensitive part of your body ?" She asked rhetorically. "So, I know you're enjoying yourself little dude." She said with a smirk.

Jesse was too exhausted to react as Emily's finger dropped down on his spit soaked body. She drug her finger down his body. Her finger nail catching the buckle of his belt. With an effortless tug she ripped it, and his pants to shreds.

As her finger retreated Jesse tried to cover himself up. pulling together the tatters of his turn pants. "Emily, stop this! Just call for help. I won't tell anyone." He pleaded.

"Lose the rest of the clothes little dude." Emily ordered firmly.

Jesse refused. "No! This isn't happening!" He shouted.

Emily narrowed her eyes. "C'mon little dude. I've been nice so far. I don't have to be." She said matter-of-factly. "Maybe I was mistaken, and you are just a bug."

Before Jesse could move Emily brought her thumb down on his entire body. The giantess added more and more pressure. Jesse felt his joints pop, and tendons stretch.

Thankfully Emily raised her thumb off of Jesse before any permanent damage could occur. "Off with the clothes." Emily ordered again.

Sore, and frightened Jesse began to strip away his remaining clothes. He felt uncomfortable with Emily staring down at him so intently. The amount of enjoyment she was getting from her power over him was terrifying.

As soon as he was naked Emily swept the clothes away with her finger. Without hesitation she lowered her mouth back over Jesse. Her powerful tongue went back to work, quickly getting his body to react.

Emily's tongue writhed up and down Jesse's penis until he was ready to explode. He pushed back against her tongue, but it was like holding back the tide. In a few short moment he came with force. His cum splattering against her tongue, before being quickly washed away in the saliva.

Emily pulled away with a satisfied smile. "Now was that so bad little dude ?" She asked, giggling.

Jesse lay splayed on her palm in a pool of the giantess's spit. He felt used, and humiliated, but most of all he felt powerless. He knew that he was completely at the mercy of Emily.

"So, I should really get back to work little dude," Emily said. "But don't worry, I'm going to put you somewhere safe."

Jesse was haphazardly lifted between the giantess's fingers. Looking out he saw Emily was going to put him.....
153113.title: Raised her hand to her mouth.

1531132.content:
Unbuttoning her pants, she then drops everything below the waist down and brings you closer to her lower half. But which way are you facing her?

Her front, where it's a tangled up mess of pubs? Or her backside, where Emily is now for wind breaking?
1531132.title: In her panties.

info.brief_description: Jesse, a janitorial supervisor suddenly shrinks to a minuscule size during his shift.
info.description:
Jesse is very durable, but not invincible when shrunk. He could for instance survive being stepped on barefoot, or sat on, but not stomped on with a shoe, or survive being eaten. I prefer unaware, but aware is welcome. Try not to end it too quickly.

No one sentence chapters, or repeated choice chapters.

No unbirthing, diapers, or sexual content with children, though feet, vore, and crushing is allowed.

Enjoy and please add.
